metadata.name: Potential Remote Desktop Tunneling
metadata.comment: Detects potential use of an SSH utility to establish RDP over a reverse SSH Tunnel. This can be used by attackers to enable routing of network packets that would otherwise not reach their intended destination.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':3389')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -pw ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ssh '))))

output.summary: Detects potential use of an SSH utility to establish RDP over a reverse SSH Tunnel. This can be used by attackers to enable routing of network packets that would otherwise not reach their intended destination.
